description: Phase 2: UI Base + Layout - shadcn/ui setup, custom theme, fonts, sidebar navigation, placeholder pages

userStories.title: Install shadcn/ui with dark theme
userStories.description: As a developer, I need shadcn/ui initialized with dark mode and minimal components.
acceptanceCriteria: Run 'npx shadcn@latest init' with dark mode, New York style, zinc base color
Install components: button, badge, skeleton via 'npx shadcn@latest add'
Verify components/ui/ folder created with 3 components
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Configure custom colors in globals.css
userStories.description: As a developer, I need industrial dark theme colors matching the wireframe.
acceptanceCriteria: Update app/globals.css with CSS variables from docs/plans/2025-02-05-phase2-ui-base-design.md section 2
Add custom colors: --color-robocizna, --color-material, --color-komplet
Add project status colors: --color-draft, --color-ofertowanie, --color-realizacja, --color-zamkniety, --color-odrzucony
Force dark class on html element in layout.tsx
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add fonts (JetBrains Mono + Plus Jakarta Sans)
userStories.description: As a developer, I need industrial typography matching the wireframe.
acceptanceCriteria: Create lib/fonts.ts with JetBrains_Mono and Plus_Jakarta_Sans from next/font/google
Export fontMono and fontSans with CSS variables --font-mono and --font-sans
Include 'latin' and 'latin-ext' subsets
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create root layout with metadata and fonts
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the root layout configured with proper metadata and fonts.
acceptanceCriteria: Update app/layout.tsx with title 'PLANY' and description 'Kosztorysowanie fit-out'
Set lang='pl' on html element
Apply font variables from lib/fonts.ts to body className
Add 'dark' class to html element
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create app shell layout with sidebar area
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the app route group with sidebar + main content layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Create app/(app)/layout.tsx with flex container
Add placeholder div for sidebar (w-[240px], fixed)
Add main area with ml-[240px] and flex-1
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create Sidebar component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the sidebar with logo and navigation sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/layout/sidebar.tsx with fixed 240px width, full height
Add logo section: 72px height, 'PLANY' text in font-mono, border-bottom
Add 2 nav sections: 'BAZA DANYCH' (5 items) and 'PROJEKTY' (3 items)
Use lucide-react icons: FolderTree, List, Package, Truck, Users, Briefcase, Calculator, Sliders
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create NavItem component with active state
userStories.description: As a developer, I need nav items with hover and active states.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/layout/nav-item.tsx as client component ('use client')
Use usePathname() from next/navigation for active state detection
Props: href, icon (LucideIcon), label
Style: hover bg-muted, active text-primary + bg-muted
Use Link from next/link for navigation
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create PageHeader component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a reusable page header with title and optional badge.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/layout/page-header.tsx
Props: title (string), badge (optional string)
Title: text-2xl font-semibold font-mono tracking-tight
Badge: shadcn Badge with variant='secondary'
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create 8 placeholder pages
userStories.description: As a developer, I need placeholder pages for all routes to verify navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Create app/(app)/kategorie/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Kategorie' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/pozycje/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Pozycje' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/materialy/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Materia≈Çy' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/dostawcy/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Dostawcy' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/podwykonawcy/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Podwykonawcy' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/projekty/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Projekty' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/kosztorys/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Kosztorys' badge='Coming soon'
Create app/(app)/kalkulatory/page.tsx with PageHeader title='Kalkulatory' badge='Coming soon'

Verify in browser: navigation between all 8 pages works, active state highlights correctly
